website_summaries.verdict: A set of 24 blended, highly pigmented colors that is both vibrant and long-lasting.
pros: These paints are priced for the budget-minded or beginning painter, but are also a great choice for the experienced artists as well
The even consistency means that the paints apply smoothly and the assortment of colors works well for a wide variety of subject matter
cons: The tubes are small, but a little bit of paint can go a long way

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to work with. Very nice variety of colors. Before I purchased, I read reviews stating they take a long time to dry. That's a side effect of oil paints. You'll find that an asset when working on a project over a longer period of time.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey b.

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: Nice Variety of Oils. Takes a while to dry but this is common with oil paint. I would have liked to see more standard blacks and whites included. Overall, You can do so much with this set And a little goes a long way for the most part. I painted a Bob Ross paint along with these sets. A little darker mood than his though. See picture.
customer_reviews.author: Texas KnowHow

customer_reviews.title: They don't dry after weeks
customer_reviews.text: I gave these paints almost three weeks before I reviewed them. Simply put, oil paints should not require weeks to dry in an arid climate. You should have to wait three to seven days. It's been weeks and my painting is still untouchable. Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Fever

customer_reviews.title: Quality oil paint set at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The moment I opened the package I noticed the impressive quality of this set of paints. I knew right away this way no ordinary company. I'm sure these would have cost more elsewhere and I saved so much time by shopping Amazon.com. Again, I say "I love you Amazon". You always find me the best bargains!
customer_reviews.author: mary a baker

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner
customer_reviews.text: Just started oil painting. Very pleased with the variety this pack offered. I wasn't sure what colors I would need/want, so bought the variety. The price seemed good. I haven't had any issues. Of course since I am a beginner, I wouldn't know if they are better and worse than others. Easy to paint with, as easy to clean as anything that requires mineral spirits. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTEN LAWRENCE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors and seems to be very high quality. Tubes are very small, but it's oils... a littlw goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Cassondra Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Just starting to experiment with oil painting, very different than watercolor, but fun and interesting. Your paint is reasonably priced, easy to mix and seems to flow from the brush very well. Excellent product at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Woodworker10

customer_reviews.title: Quality paint
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I've been transitioning from watercolors to oils so I wanted something reasonably priced to experiment with. Instead of experiments, I was able to render one of my best paintings yet! They work just as well as Academy or other super expensive paints. The tubes are a nice size and the color selection is great. They will last me a long time too. Just a dab with some linseed oil goed on for miles.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Experimenting with oils, was not happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Some colors clump! Not silky smooth texture, Red oil color 3 weeks later did not dry
customer_reviews.author: Freddy G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My friends daughter received this from me as a bday gift. She has never worked with oil paint before. She loves it. Her paintings have been beautiful that she has shown me. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: whitandcheymom

customer_reviews.title: Drying time is forever.
customer_reviews.text: Good price, small tubes, takes weeks to dry unacceptable from an artist standpoint. If the drying time wasn't so long I would of given them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: melody mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Just... ok.
customer_reviews.text: These oils were ok. The gold and silver didn't work very well. The other colors performed ok, for such an inexpensive price. You definitely get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Eads

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Colors vibarant and easy to mix together to make a particular shade. Art is so fun. Consistency of paint in even and not too liquidy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are oil paints
customer_reviews.text: Good vibrant colors for the price I suggest buying them for someone who's trying to begin oil painting
customer_reviews.author: Russell E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety of colors at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present for my granddaughter (a beginning painter.) She was excited to receive it. This gave her a nice variety of paint colors at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: JK Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great for our needs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my kids. I’m not any authority on paint quality but totally meets my expectations and had no issues with these oil paints.
customer_reviews.author: Nik517

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product for beginners I got it for my girlfriend and she's loved it.
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I like the oil paints the only down side; it’s not the best in terms of quality but it’s good for beginners and kids etc..
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. We are new to oil paints. This gave us a wide range of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: and good control. thanks
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my son's paint party. Vibrant colors, and good control. thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I think this paint is good for those who haven’t used oil paints before (like myself). They come with an assortment of colors which is also good! The color are also very vibrant as well. I would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, cheap price
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and very cheap price. Paints were delivered even before the expected date of arrival. Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: Moderately priced oil paints a great buy !
customer_reviews.text: I needed some moderately priced oils to try the cold wax method. These fit my need, and worked well Thank you
customer_reviews.author: linda parker

customer_reviews.title: How to clean brushes
customer_reviews.text: I like it the only thing how do use them I paint before and I used terpentine to clean brushes, I would like to know what can I use to clean the brushes Email me and let me know please!
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: The color selection is pretty good for a starter set
customer_reviews.text: The color selection is pretty good for a starter set. The paint isn't amazing, but it's a great place to get started. Buy a big tube of white to go with it, as you will run out of titanium white before anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: This is a great starter set for any starter oil painter!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product it has a great variety of colors and is a wonderful starter set. Fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Jean B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom. She isn't a beginner but the paint colors are so vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie house

customer_reviews.title: Good colors
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors for beginners. I found no problem in using them. They are blended properly with oil.
customer_reviews.author: Jayati

customer_reviews.title: Love this !!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it and just what I was looking for !! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Nithya

customer_reviews.title: Pros: cheap, lots of color choices Cons:
customer_reviews.text: Pros: cheap, lots of color choices Cons: takes forever to dry (even for an oil paint) and isn't very opaque
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Oil paints I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I really like these paints, they had the colors I wanted. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: LYNN

customer_reviews.title: Good for a beginner although seems to have more oil ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for a beginner although seems to have more oil then pigment. not by much but though. would recommend for beginners
customer_reviews.author: tai

customer_reviews.title: Customer service 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service from Castle Art Supplies. Paints are great and would definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Piscuc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, so far they do the job! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular variety of high pigment colors! These are a great quality, soft and easy to brush right out of the tube. This was exactly what I wanted for my collection of art supplies.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: This product was great. The package arrived without any damage and much ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was great. The package arrived without any damage and much earlier than the actual delivery date. I am very happy with the product and the colors are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: JoyPainting

customer_reviews.title: these paints are fine but I should have looked more closely - I ...
customer_reviews.text: these paints are fine but I should have looked more closely - I meant to buy the watercolors. The packaging is exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: jlppoet

customer_reviews.title: Castle Art Supplies
customer_reviews.text: It came it super fast! I was very impressed. It looks fabulous...I have not started painting with it yet, since I am awaiting Galkyd and thinner, but I am so excited about Castle Art Supplies!
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Oil paint set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice beginners set. The colors have nice saturation and coverage. If you do encaustics or cold wax methods these are perfect set for a variety of colors to add to your wax. I think they are very nice and would recommend for a great little travel set too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oil paints for the beginner.
customer_reviews.text: My little lady is enjoying her paints. And is surprising everyone with how good she is with them. She loves the many color choices this art set gives her! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine G. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Terrific starter set and for all other oil painters
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, cost-effective product. A great starter set for someone who is new to painting with oils. This set will provide the recipient with a solid foundation to play and experiment with oils. I thank you for their development and availability.
customer_reviews.author: Comet

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter as she loves to paint.. great set lots of color options.. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mary Waters

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Very colorful and perfect for a beginner in oil paints
customer_reviews.author: Lindsi Werner

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice set of paints
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set of paints. The colors are beautiful and easy to use. They exhibit the quality I've come to associate with the name Castle. I have extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: pat c.

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: Great set for beginners ! Just go to your hardware store and pick up some thinner to clean your brushes.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great oil paints!!
customer_reviews.text: I got them for my wife and she loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Set is great oil is difficult tp work with that goes for ...
customer_reviews.text: Set is great oil is difficult tp work with that goes for any oil tho would recommend this set
customer_reviews.author: frank eosso

product_meta.title: Castle Art Supplies Oil Paint Set - 24 Vibrant Colors in Tubes - Excellent Value Supplies with Beautiful Saturation and Coverage. This Set Makes it Easy and Fun to Explore Oil Painting
product_meta.description:
Look no further – you’ve found the perfect set of artist quality oil paints!

Our artists have been busy testing, selecting and perfecting our brand new set of professional quality oil paints, and they have done an incredible job.

Here’s our checklist:

 * Luxurious, vibrant, colors
 * Pigment rich for stunning results
 * Top blending performance
 * No fade or color shift
 * Non-toxic for safe use
 * Sealed for ultimate freshness
 * Presented to perfection

Check! Check! Check!

But before we could give these paints the official Castle Art Supplies ‘seal of approval' we checked two more boxes:



 * Great value (hurry as our introductory price won’t be around for long)
 * Peace of mind with our Money Back Guarantee+ which means that if you are not entirely happy with your paints we will refund you and you keep the paints.
feature_bullets: TOP QUALITY, EASY TO WORK WITH OIL PAINTS YOU WILL LOVE. We know that painting in this medium can be a little overwhelming…but it doesn’t need to be. With this ‘tried and tested’ set of easy to use oil paints, you will benefit from our carefully selected range of colors - particularly helpful if you are not entirely sure what shades you are going to need! And with their even consistency and smooth application, you are sure to fall in love in no time.

FIRM, CONSISTENT TEXTURE DESIGNED TO LAST! Create a masterpiece that truly stands out with these highly pigmented, luxurious paints that provide artists with a reliable, consistent texture that is easy to work with and helps them to create captivating, vibrant results on their canvas. Be the envy of fellow artists when your work is taken to a new level.

SUITABLE FOR NUMEROUS OIL PAINT TECHNIQUES including Alla Prima (wet on wet), Impasto (as loved by Vincent Van Gogh) and blending. These versatile paints are expertly formulated with a balance of oil and pigment to give artists the flexibility they desire. Designed to mix well and with slow drying properties you expect from oil paints, there is time to immerse yourself in the creative process, achieving the perfect results.

TRIED & TESTED COLORS WITH STAYING POWER…whether experimenting in the medium for the first time or already fully accomplished, we understand just how important great results are to you (and your art) so we’ve squeezed every drop of color from top quality pigment into these air-tight, resealable tubes, ensuring you enjoy fresh, vibrant paint time after time after time.

BUY TODAY - WORRY & HASSLE FREE! Creating beautiful art should be easy and fun. Use our step-by-step tutorial (included) to recreate Lady Guinevere of King Arthur fame, who appears on the cover of your set. Let us remove any worry or hassle with our unique Money Back Plus Guarantee which means that if you are not entirely happy with your product, we will refund you and you keep the paints!
